snippet.title: Final Shot | Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
When the only way is revenge!

Travel across the planet to find your teacher's killer. You'll have to sneak through hundreds of enemies to face him one-on-one. The outcome of the battle will depend only on you!

Use all the weapons you can - from knives and sledgehammers to a pile of firearms. Select tactics for surprise attacks and quick maneuvers among crowds of enemies.

Test yourself in adrenaline-pumping top-down action and prove that you are ready to go all the way to the end - to the Final Shot!

-----

Available November 17, 2023 on PS4, Xbox One 
and November 24, 2023 on Nintendo Switch!

Follow Chilidog Interactive on X (Twitter): https://twitter.com/ChiliDogInt
Our site: https://chilidoginteractive.com

#FinalShot #ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #xboxone #xboxseriesx #nintendoswitch
